participant_1.name: Kevin
participant_1.personality: Curious and nostalgic, Kevin enjoys exploring new places and values unique collections.
participant_1.background: I like to ski. I like to eat cheetos. My wife doesn't like me anymore. I have went to Mexico 4 times this year. I hate Mexican food.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, Megan loves spending her time in charming places and has a passion for collecting.
participant_2.background: Starbucks is my favorite hang out spot. I have a cat. Subway is my favorite fast food restaurant. I collect little figurines. I spend my weekends browsing antique stores.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I like to go antiquing and collect little figurines.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love antique stores.
Me too! I find all sorts of interesting things there.
What kind of things do you collect?
Mostly little figurines, but I also collect old books, jewelry, and furniture.
That's so cool! I wish I had the space to collect things.
Yeah, it can get pretty cluttered.
What's your favorite place to go antiquing?
I love going to the antique stores in the city. There's always something new to find.
I've never been to an antique store in the city. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a lot of fun.
What's your favorite thing about collecting little figurines?
I just love the way they look. They're so cute and unique.
I know what you mean. I have a little figurine collection too.
Really? What kind of figurines do you collect?
I mostly collect fairy figurines. I think they're so pretty.
Fairy figurines are so cute! I have a few myself.
That's awesome! I'm glad to meet another person who collects little figurines.
Me too! It's not a very common hobby.
I know, right? But it's so much fun
